article_text: How convenient for Gov. Sam Brownback: Six days after Kansas voters re-elected him, they discovered Monday that he had sold them a budget with a $1 billion black hole. Sorry, voters, but lots of people hoped you would oust this guy, not put him back in charge of a failed tax-cut experiment.

Sam Brownback: Six days after Kansas voters re-elected him, they discovered Monday that he had sold them a budget with a $1 billion black hole.
